SELECT om.order_code, rs.user_code, rs.user_id, rs.user_name, rs.user_roles, prd.prd_code, prd.prd_name, om.event_code, om.payment_status, om.order_status, om.cs_status, om.payment_method, om.payment_amount, om.create_date,
(select count(*) from order_mst) as total_count
, (select SUM(payment_amount) from order_mst) as total_price,
(select count(*) from order_mst where DATE_FORMAT(create_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() ) as today_sale_count,
(select sum(payment_amount) from order_mst where DATE_FORMAT(create_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() ) as today_sale_price,
(select count(*) from order_mst where create_date between date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-01') and date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) as this_month_sale_count,
(select sum(payment_amount) from order_mst where create_date between date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-01') and date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) as this_month_sale_price
FROM order_mst om LEFT OUTER JOIN product prd ON(prd.prd_code = om.prd_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN register rs ON(rs.user_code = om.user_code) WHERE rs.user_roles LIKE 'ROLE_USER'
limit #{index}, 10
